column1: Q1a:Are you generally satisfied with your overall experience of roads on the Ugandan road network?

column53: Old Masaka Road(Kyengera-Kabojja Secondary school turn off) (Kampala/Wakiso)

column1: Q1d:If you think your experience when using using ugandan roads has either improved significantly or improved over the past 12months, Why do you think this is?

column53: Old Masaka Road(Kyengera-Kabojja Secondary school turn off) (Kampala/Wakiso)

column2: Strict road usage rules for boda bodas
Roads have been tarmacked/more gravel roads
More street Lights on the roads
Construction of drainage system/Improved drainage system
More community sensitisation about roads and road reserves
